juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   A woman
*   A white apron (worn by the woman)
*   Gas stovetop
*   White oven
*   Wooden countertop
*   White kitchen cabinets and drawers
*   White brick wall (backsplash)
*   White range hood
*   White shelves
*   Various kitchen items on the white shelves (including jars, plants, pasta, containers)
*   Hanging decorations on the brick wall (including "LOVE" letters and star shapes)
*   Two wooden cutting boards (propped on the countertop)
*   Wooden rolling pin (on the countertop)
*   Utensil holder with utensils (e.g., whisks, on the countertop)
*   Partially visible white toaster (on the left countertop)
*   Tissue box (on the right countertop)
*   Small potted plant (on the right countertop, next to the tissue box)
*   Framed picture (on the right brick wall)
